entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Hero Dr.GraffÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $2.99 ($2.99 ~ $4.99)
  • Hero Blue DragonÔºö$6.99 ‚Üí $4.99 ($4.99 ~ $6.99)
  • Hero Sha'TraÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $2.99 ($2.99 ~ $4.99)
  • Hero AjaxÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí $0.99 ($0.99 ~ $2.99)
  • Hero Mark XÔºö$6.99 ‚Üí $4.99 ($4.99 ~ $6.99)
  • Hero FateÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí $0.99 ($0.99 ~ $2.99)

Application Description

From the creators of the award winner, Kingdom Rush saga comes the most extraordinary space odyssey. Fight challenging real time strategy sci fi battles on amazing and unknown planets. Command brave soldiers, mighty mechas and powerful aliens against hordes of space monsters, swarms of insectoids and robot armies in a galaxy far far away. PLAN, ATTACK AND BEAT ALL THE ENEMIES ADAPTING YOUR STRATEGY by changing the role of your troops even in the thick of the combat, from ranger to sniper, from flamethrowers to missile launchers. ADAPT YOUR STRATEGY by changing the role of your troops even in the thick of battle, from ranger to sniper, from flamethrowers to missile launchers. RECRUIT AND TRAIN THE GREATEST HEROES in the galaxy, lead them into dangerous territory against near-impossible odds and unleash their mighty powers and abilities. TURN THE TIDE OF BATTLE with orbital strikes, intelligent mines, support troops, turrets and a wide array of special weapons. Armies of robots, crushed starships, gigantic monsters, unknown races, brave assaults, desperate rescues, audacious sabotages... the galaxy needs your command. The galaxy needs the Iron Marines FEATURES ‚Ä¢ 21 CAMPAIGN MISSIONS across three sci fi planets. Each action-packed challenge will have you improve your strategy to save the galaxy! ‚Ä¢ 17 SPECIAL OPERATIONS that will test if you have what it takes to battle your way through space. ‚Ä¢ 40+ UPGRADES to build the ultimate RTS army! Choose between Defense Drones, Napalm Rockets, Ricocheting Blasts, Lethal Weapons and many more. ‚Ä¢ +7 UNITS to bring into battle and give your hero some extra firepower! ‚Ä¢ 8 SPECIAL WEAPONS to unleash hell on your enemies and keep expanding your tactics like space itself! What‚Äôs better than a well-placed missile? An orbital strike of 50 high-explosive missiles! ‚Ä¢ DEFEAT UNIQUE BOSSES in epic battles. They are green, mean, killing machines!!! Well‚Ä¶ some are machines and these aliens aren‚Äôt green‚Ä¶ but they‚Äôre all massive and determined to crush you. Suit up, Marines! ‚Ä¢ 70+ ACHIEVEMENTS to complete and show everyone you‚Äôre the best RTS commander in the whole galaxy! ‚Ä¢ NO WI-FI IN SPACE? No worries, offline play guaranteed! ‚Ä¢ CHOOSE YOUR DIFFICULTY MODE: Casual, Normal or Veteran. Don‚Äôt get cocky! Or Do! Your choice! ‚Ä¢ IMPOSSIBLE MODE. Only for the most daring, reckless, all-out-of-bubblegum marines in space. We dare you!
